mapper.select: select b.no, title, u.name, hit, b.reg_date as regDate, content from rboard b, users u where b.user_no = u.no
select title, u.name, hit, b.reg_date as regDate, content from rboard b join users u on b.user_no = u.no where b.no = #{no};
select b.no, title, u.name, hit, b.reg_date as regDate, content from rboard b join users u on b.user_no = u.no where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or name like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
select c.no, title, u.name, hit, c.reg_date as regDate, content, group_no, order_no from cboard c, users u where c.user_no = u.no order by group_no DESC, order_no ASC
select title, u.name, hit, c.reg_date as regDate, content from cboard c join users u on c.user_no = u.no where c.no = #{no};
